snippet: Sunderland forward Fabio Borini believes his relegation-threatened team can take advantage of Manchester City's "shaky" defence in Sunday's Premier League contest....

headline.main: There Is No Economic Case for Breaking Up the United Kingdom, Says May
headline.print_headline: There Is No Economic Case for Breaking Up the United Kingdom, Says May

lead_paragraph: Sunderland forward Fabio Borini believes his relegation-threatened team can take advantage of Manchester City's "shaky" defence in Sunday's Premier League contest.
